problem.title: Problem
problem.headline: List your top 1-3 problems.
problem.subHeadline: List how these problems are solved today.

solution.title: Solution
solution.headline: Outline a possible solution for each problem.

keyMetrics.title: Key Metrics
keyMetrics.headline: List the key numbers that tell you how your business is doing.

uniqueValueProposition.title: Unique Value Proposition
uniqueValueProposition.headline: Single, clear, compelling message that states why you are different and worth paying attention.
uniqueValueProposition.subHeadline: List your X for Y analogy e.g. YouTube = Flickr for videos

unfairAdvantage.title: Unfair Advantage
unfairAdvantage.headline: Something that cannot easily be bought or copied.

channels.title: Channel
channels.headline: List your path to customers (inbound or outbound).

customerSegments.title: Customer Segments
customerSegments.headline: List you target customers and users.
customerSegments.subHeadline: List the characteristics of you ideal customers.

costStructure.title: Cost Structure
costStructure.headline: List your fixed and variable costs.
